name: Cupid's Revenge
description:
Our first game ever! 

We wanted to do a Love vs Hate concept based on the MiniJam124 theme: "Warmth".  We interpreted love as warmth. The monsters of the game are creating chaos and spreading hate all over the way, that's why Cupid's getting mad (they are basically making his job harder). 

There was a limitation as well: 'Your score serves a purpose'. However, being this our first project ever, we had little to no time at all to implement this the way we wanted.

We tried our best to do all the thing we originally planned, but we had a hard time on doing certain things. We will continue to finish and polish the game though.

Any feedback or comment will be gratefully receive.

Note: ver 0.2 is a little more playable. (But not the original one sent for the jam).
